properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v14 v7 v7 v8 v9 v15 v16 v17 v18 v7 v19 v20 v21 v22 v23 v7 v7 v8 v9 v24 v7 v7 v8 v9 v8 v25

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus Never Fails

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: So many souls have tested Him throughout the course of time.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So many still reach out to Him with broken hearts and minds.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And every one of them will say,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Without exception that they find…

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Jesus never fails...

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Jesus never fails.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: You might as well get thee behind me, Satan

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: You cannot prevail, because Jesus never fails.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Even in the days of old, He brought His people through.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: And then He came to show His love and died for me and you.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Then He rose again to prove,

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: That every story has been true…

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Jesus never fails…

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Sometimes this world brings trouble I find so hard to bear.

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: I know I could not make it, without Jesus being there.

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: It’s so encouraging to know,

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: How ever deep we’re in despair…

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: So what can I do to prove to you, tell me how can you deny?

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: No untold facts, no mysteries, it’s all so cut and dried.

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: On the witness stand of your life,

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: I’ll be the first to testify…

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: Jesus never fails!

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: I know…

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: You cannot prevail, because Jesus never fails
